          <title>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Energie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Énergie</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Energia</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ενέργεια</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Energía</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This bar graph shows the amount of energy needed in jogging, riding a bike, walking and sleeping.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">biking</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Energy</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">jogging</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">sleeping</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">walking</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieses Balkendiagramm zeigt die Menge von Energie
benötigt beim Rütteln und reitet ein Fahrrad, das Gehen und das 
Schlafen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce diagramme à barres montre la quantité 
d'énergie requise en pulsant, montant un vélo, la marche et le 
sommeil.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este gráfico de barra mostra a quantidade de 
energia necessitada em movimentar-se, montando uma bicicleta, andar e 
dormir.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo grafico a strisce mostra la quantità di 
energia stata necessaria nel pareggiare, guidando una bici, camminare 
ed il sonno.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η γραφική παράσταση ράβδων εμφανίζει το ποσό 
ενέργειας που απαιτείται, την οδήγηση ενός ποδηλάτου, το 
περπάτημα και τον ύπνο.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este gráfico de barra muestra la cantidad de 
energía necesitada en activar, montando una bici, recorrer y dormir.</string>
          </description>
